<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Assisting Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=364) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 145 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47) (Level 4), [Sniping Duo](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=121) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a ranged weapon.

</column>

---

With a quick shot, you interfere with a foe in combat. Make a Strike with a ranged weapon. If the Strike hits, the next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their roll, or a +2 circumstance bonus if your Strike was a critical hit.
